<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>Generation of diagram and flowchart from text in a similar manner as markdown</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">通过 mermaid  可以实现以纯文本的方式绘制流程图，序列图，甘特图等。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">小书匠编辑器在 markdown 强大的优势下，更是无缝集成了 mermaid 的所有功能，用户不需要任何配置，只要打开了语法开关，就可以使用所有 mermaid 图例功能。再加上小书匠的实时预览功能，可以马上查看到输入的 mermaid 代码生成的效果图。大大提高了用户绘图的速度。</p>
<h1 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h1" id="e4bdbfe794a8_2"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e4bdbfe794a8_2" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e4bdbfe794a8_2" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="使用" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="使用" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">使用</span></h1>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">元数据标识: grammar_mermaid</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">想要使用该语法，需要在<code>设置>扩展语法</code> 里把<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">mermaid</strong>选项打开。或者在每篇文章的元数据里通过 <code>grammar_mermaid</code> 进行控制。系统默认关闭<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">mermaid</strong>语法功能</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">mermaid 提供了流程图，序列图，甘特图等多种图形效果</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">mermaid的语法为代码块语法的执行功能，语言为 <code>mermaid</code></p>

</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">mermaid</span></h1>
<h2 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h2" id="e6b581e7a88be59bbe_6"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e6b581e7a88be59bbe_6" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e6b581e7a88be59bbe_6" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="流程图" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="流程图" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">流程图</span></h2>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">因为 mermaid 支持不同图表，所以所有的流程图需要以 <code>graph</code> 开头</p>
<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e59bbee8a1a8e696b9e59091_7"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e59bbee8a1a8e696b9e59091_7" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e59bbee8a1a8e696b9e59091_7" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="图表方向" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="图表方向" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">图表方向</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">在 <code>graph</code> 的后方添加流程图的显示方向</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>TB -从上到下</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>BT - 从下到上</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>RL - 从右到左</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>LR - 从左到右</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>TD - 跟 TB 一样，从上到下</li>
</ul>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div class="xiaoshujiang_code_title_container"><span class="xiaoshujiang_code_title">从左到右的图表</span><span class="xiaoshujiang_code_infos">    4行</span><div style="clear: both;" class="xiaoshujiang_code_clear"></div></div><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>``` mermaid!<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="2"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">2</span>graph LR<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="3"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">3</span>    Start --> Stop<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="4"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">4</span>```<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e8bf9ee7babf_29"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e8bf9ee7babf_29" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e8bf9ee7babf_29" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="连线" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="连线" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">连线</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">6种不同类型的连线</p>
<table class="table table-striped table-celled">
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Type</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>-></td>
<td>不带箭头的实线</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>--></td>
<td>不带箭头的虚线</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>->></td>
<td>带箭头的实线</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>-->></td>
<td>带箭头的虚线</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>-x</td>
<td>末端为叉的实线（表示异步）</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>--x</td>
<td>末端为叉的虚线（表示异步）</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e6b688e681afe69687e69cac_30"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e6b688e681afe69687e69cac_30" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e6b688e681afe69687e69cac_30" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="消息文本" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="消息文本" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">消息文本</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">消息显示在连线的上方</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>[参与者1][连线][参与者2]:消息文本<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>
<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e6b4bbe58aa8e4b8ad_31"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e6b4bbe58aa8e4b8ad_31" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e6b4bbe58aa8e4b8ad_31" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="活动中" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="活动中" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">活动中</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">在消息线末尾增加 <code>+</code> ，则消息接收者进入当前消息的“活动中”状态；<br>
在消息线末尾增加 <code>-</code> ，则消息接收者离开当前消息的“活动中”状态。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">或者使用以下语法直接说明某个参与者进入/离开“活动中”状态:</p>

  <a name="e6a087e6b3a8_32" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e6a087e6b3a8_32" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="标注" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="标注" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>

<span class="xsj_heading_content">标注</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">可以对流程图进行标注，标注位置支持 <code>左侧</code>, <code>右侧</code> 和 <code>横跨</code> 三种方式</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>Note 位置表述 参与者: 标注文字<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">其中位置表述可以为</p>
<table class="table table-striped table-celled">
<thead>
<tr>
<th>表述</th>
<th>含义</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>right of</td>
<td>右侧</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>left of</td>
<td>左侧</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>over</td>
<td>在当中，可以横跨多个参与者</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e887aae5ae9ae4b989e6a0b7e5bc8f_35"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e887aae5ae9ae4b989e6a0b7e5bc8f_35" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e887aae5ae9ae4b989e6a0b7e5bc8f_35" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="自定义样式" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="自定义样式" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">自定义样式</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">mermaid 在生成序列图时，会定义很多 class, 配合上小书匠的自定义 css 样式，用户可以进行更个性化的样式控制</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">下面列出的是 mermaid 生成的 class</p>
<table class="table table-striped table-celled">
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Class</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>actor</td>
<td>Style for the actor box at the top of the diagram.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>text.actor</td>
<td>Styles for text in the actor box at the top of the diagram.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>actor-line</td>
<td>The vertical line for an actor.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>messageLine0</td>
<td>Styles for the solid message line.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>messageLine1</td>
<td>Styles for the dotted message line.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>messageText</td>
<td>Defines styles for the text on the message arrows.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>labelBox</td>
<td>Defines styles label to left in a loop.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>labelText</td>
<td>Styles for the text in label for loops.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>loopText</td>
<td>Styles for the text in the loop box.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>loopLine</td>
<td>Defines styles for the lines in the loop box.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>note</td>
<td>Styles for the note box.</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>noteText</td>
<td>Styles for the text on in the note boxes.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h2 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h2" id="e7b1bbe59bbe_36"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e7b1bbe59bbe_36" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e7b1bbe59bbe_36" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="类图" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="类图" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">类图</span></h2>
<blockquote class="markdown_blockquote">
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>"In software engineering, a class diagram in the Unified Modeling Language (UML) is a type of static structure diagram that describes the structure of a system by showing the system's classes, their attributes, operations (or methods), and the relationships among objects."<br>
Wikipedia</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">类图用于面向对象对于应用结构概念建模, 也用于把具体的模型翻译成程序代码。类图也可以用于数据建模。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 支持类图语法显示</p>

<span class="xsj_heading_content">语法</span></h3>
<h4 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h4" id="e7b1bbe7bb93e69e84_38"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e7b1bbe7bb93e69e84_38" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e7b1bbe7bb93e69e84_38" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="类结构" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="类结构" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">类结构</span></h4>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">UML 提供一种机制表示类及成员，比如属性，方法和一些其他额外信息。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">一个简单的类在图形上主要包含下面三种主要部份：</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>最顶层为类的名称。显示为粗体，且首字母为大写。同时可以定义一些描述文字。</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>中间层为类的属性。多个属性之间将进行左对齐排列，属性名称以小写开头。</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>底层部份为类的一些方法函数。多个方法之间将进行左对齐排列，方法名称也是以小写开头。</li>
</ul>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e5ae9ae4b989e4b880e4b8aae7b1bb_39"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e5ae9ae4b989e4b880e4b8aae7b1bb_39" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e5ae9ae4b989e4b880e4b8aae7b1bb_39" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="定义一个类" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="定义一个类" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">定义一个类</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">两种方法定义一个类:</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>通过关键字 <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">class</strong> ,　比如 <code>class Animal</code>, 显示定义一个类。</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>通过两个类之间的关系 <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">relationship</strong> ，来隐式定义类。比如 <code>Vehicle <|-- Car</code>，这样就定义了两个类 <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">Vehicle</strong> 和 <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">Car</strong>，以及他们之间的关系。</li>
</ul>

<span class="xsj_heading_content">定义类的成员</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 通过括号 <code>()</code> 区分类的属性和方法。带有 <code>()</code> 的内容，将会做为方法进行显示，其他的则做为类的属性。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 提供两种方法定义类的成员</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>类外字义</li>
</ul>

<span class="xsj_heading_content">泛型</span></h5>

<h5 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h5" id="e58fafe8a781e680a7_43"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e58fafe8a781e680a7_43" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e58fafe8a781e680a7_43" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="可见性" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="可见性" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">可见性</span></h5>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">类成员的可见性有四种，在类成员的名称前面添加下面这些符号来进行表示。</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><code>+</code> Public</li>
<li><code>-</code> Private</li>
<li><code>#</code> Protected</li>
<li><code>~</code> Package/Internal</li>
</ul>
<blockquote class="markdown_blockquote">
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>类成员方法还可以在其结尾处添加下面两种符号来表示方法的类型，比如静态和虚函数。</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><code>*</code> Abstract e.g.: <code>someAbstractMethod()*</code></li>
<li><code>$</code> Static e.g.: <code>someStaticMethod()$</code></li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e5ae9ae4b989e7b1bbe4b98be997b4e79a84e585b3e7b3bb_44"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e5ae9ae4b989e7b1bbe4b98be997b4e79a84e585b3e7b3bb_44" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e5ae9ae4b989e7b1bbe4b98be997b4e79a84e585b3e7b3bb_44" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="定义类之间的关系" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="定义类之间的关系" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">定义类之间的关系</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">主要语法：</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>[classA][Arrow][ClassB]:LabelText<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 支持的几种类之间关系</p>
<table class="table table-striped table-celled">
<thead>
<tr>
<th>语法</th>
<th>描述</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><|--</td>
<td>继承</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>*--</td>
<td>组合</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>o--</td>
<td>聚合</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>--></td>
<td>关联</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>--</td>
<td>实线连接</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>..></td>
<td>依赖</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>..|></td>
<td>实现</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>..</td>
<td>虚线连接</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e59fbae695b0e5928ce5a49ae9878de680a7e59ca8e585b3e7b3bbe4b88ae79a84e8a1a8e7a4ba_45"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e59fbae695b0e5928ce5a49ae9878de680a7e59ca8e585b3e7b3bbe4b88ae79a84e8a1a8e7a4ba_45" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e59fbae695b0e5928ce5a49ae9878de680a7e59ca8e585b3e7b3bbe4b88ae79a84e8a1a8e7a4ba_45" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="基数和多重性在关系上的表示" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="基数和多重性在关系上的表示" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">基数和多重性在关系上的表示</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">多种基数表示</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><code>1</code> Only 1</li>
<li><code>0..1</code> Zero or One</li>
<li><code>1..*</code> One or more</li>
<li><code>*</code> Many</li>
<li><code>n</code> n {where n>1}</li>
<li><code>0..n</code> zero to n {where n>1}</li>
<li><code>1..n</code> one to n {where n>1}</li>
</ul>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">在关系<code>arrow</code>的前面或者后面可以添加用引用 <code>"</code> 包裹的基数内容,用以实现多重性的定义显示效果。实际上，该引号内包裹的内容可以不一定需要上面提到的基数文本，用户自己输入一些描述文字也是可以的。</p>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e7b1bbe79a84e6b3a8e8a7a3_46"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e7b1bbe79a84e6b3a8e8a7a3_46" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e7b1bbe79a84e6b3a8e8a7a3_46" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="类的注解" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="类的注解" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">类的注解</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">通过特定的文本来注解类的信息</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><code><<Interface>></code> 表示接口</li>
<li><code><<abstract>></code> 表示抽像类</li>
<li><code><<Service>></code> 服务类</li>
<li><code><<enumeration>></code> 枚举类</li>
</ul>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">将要注解的信息用 <code><<</code> 和 <code>>></code> 包裹实现。系统提供两种方式的类注解</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>单独行注解:</li>
</ul>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>classDiagram<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="2"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">2</span>class Shape<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="3"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">3</span><span class="mark xsj_code_format xsj_code_mark"><<interface>></span> Shape<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>

<span class="xsj_heading_content">状态图</span></h2>
<blockquote class="markdown_blockquote">
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>"A state diagram is a type of diagram used in computer science and related fields to describe the behavior of systems. State diagrams require that the system described is composed of a finite number of states; sometimes, this is indeed the case, while at other times this is a reasonable abstraction." Wikipedia</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 最新版本支持状态图的显示，语法与 plantUml 类似</p>

<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">In state diagrams systems are described in terms of its states and how the systems state can change to another state via a transitions. The example diagram above shows three states <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">Still</strong>, <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">Moving</strong> and <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">Crash</strong>. You start in the state of Still. From Still you can change the state to Moving. In Moving you can change the state either back to Still or to Crash. There is no transition from Still to Crash.</p>
<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e78ab6e68081_50"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e78ab6e68081_50" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e78ab6e68081_50" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="状态" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="状态" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">状态</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">状态可以用多种方式表示。最简单的方式就是定义状态 id 默认为状态的显示</p>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e7bb84e59088e78ab6e68081_53"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e7bb84e59088e78ab6e68081_53" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e7bb84e59088e78ab6e68081_53" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="组合状态" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="组合状态" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">组合状态</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">组合状态，也可以说成子状态，也就是所谓的一个状态里包含多个状态，他们对于外部的状态，其实是一个黑盒子，但在内部里，却有自己的逻辑关系。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">定义一个组合状态，通过 <code>state</code> 指令，指定哪个状态需要变成组合状态，然后再通过 <code>{}</code> 符号，将子状态的状态图包裹在内就可以了。</p>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e6a087e8aeb0_56"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e6a087e8aeb0_56" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e6a087e8aeb0_56" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="标记" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="标记" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">标记</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">有些状态可以通过名称很容易理解状态的意义，但有些状态无法通过状态名称快速的了解其作用，或者这些状态需要一些额外的说明，这时候，可以通过标记功能实现。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">除了指令 <code>note</code> 外，还需要使用<code>right of</code>或者<code>left of</code>指定标记放置的位置。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">多行标记时，需要使用 <code>end note</code> 结束标记显示。</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>    stateDiagram-v2<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="2"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">2</span>        State1: The state with a note<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum line_mark" date-linenum="3"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">3</span>        <span class="mark xsj_code_format xsj_code_mark">note right of State1</span><span style="user-select:none;display:none;" class="mark xsj_code_format xsj_code_mark"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="4"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">4</span><span class="mark xsj_code_format xsj_code_mark">            Important information! <span class="xsj_heading_content">状态图方向</span></h3>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">使用 <code>direction</code> 指令，可以改变状态图显示的方向布局，支持的方向有<code>LR</code>,<code>RL</code>,<code>TB</code>和<code>BT</code></p>

<h2 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h2" id="e5ae9ee4bd93e585b3e7b3bbe59bbe_60"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e5ae9ee4bd93e585b3e7b3bbe59bbe_60" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e5ae9ee4bd93e585b3e7b3bbe59bbe_60" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="实体关系图" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="实体关系图" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">实体关系图</span></h2>
<blockquote class="markdown_blockquote">
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>An entity–relationship model (or ER model) describes interrelated things of interest in a specific domain of knowledge. A basic ER model is composed of entity types (which classify the things of interest) and specifies relationships that can exist between entities (instances of those entity types).</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">实体关系图里的<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">实体</strong>，通常指的是实体类别，并不是具体的一个实体。比如我们说的<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">客户</strong>,就是指具有相似性的所有客户，而不是指具体的一个客户。实体关系图里的<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">关系</strong>，也是对实休这一类别之间的关系描述。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 显示实体关系图示例</p>

<h3 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h3" id="e8afade6b395_61"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e8afade6b395_61" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e8afade6b395_61" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="语法" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="语法" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">语法</span></h3>
<h4 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h4" id="e5ae9ee4bd93e5928ce585b3e7b3bb_62"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e5ae9ee4bd93e5928ce585b3e7b3bb_62" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e5ae9ee4bd93e5928ce585b3e7b3bb_62" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="实体和关系" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="实体和关系" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">实体和关系</span></h4>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 使用了和 PlantUML类似的语法来实现实体关系图的显示。<br>
每一行语句主要由下面几个部分组成：</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>    <first-entity> [<relationship> <second-entity> : <relationship-label>]<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">这些字段的含义:</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><code>first-entity</code> 第一个实体名称。  名称只能包含字母，数字，连接符或者下划线。</li>
<li><code>relationship</code> 实体之间的关系。后面会详细介绍关系的含义。</li>
<li><code>second-entity</code> 第二个实体名称</li>
<li><code>relationship-label</code> 从第一个实体的角度描述与第二个实体之间的关系</li>
</ul>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">例如:</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>    PROPERTY ||--|{ ROOM : contains<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">该语句可以解释为<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">一个 PROPERTY 包含一个或者多个 ROOM,一个 ROOM 是一个 PROPERTY 的一部份</strong>。<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">contains</strong> 是从 <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">PROPERTY</strong> 角度出发，描述<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">PROPERTY</strong> 和 <strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">ROOM</strong>之间为包含关系。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">只有<code>first-entity</code>是必须的，其他都是可选的。如果只有<code>first-entity</code>,则表示这个实体与其他实体没有任何关系。如果除了<code>first-entity</code>部份，还有其他部份，则其他部份就必须全部包括在内，否则就是一个错误的语句格式。</p>
<h4 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h4" id="e585b3e7b3bbe8afade6b395_63"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e585b3e7b3bbe8afade6b395_63" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e585b3e7b3bbe8afade6b395_63" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="关系语法" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="关系语法" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">关系语法</span></h4>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0"><code>relationship</code> 可以分成三个部分</p>
<ul class="markdown_ul">
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>第一个实体相对于第二个实体的基数,</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>该关系是否赋予了 "子 "实体身份</li>
<li><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>第二个实体相对于第一个实体的基数</li>
</ul>
<table class="table table-striped table-celled">
<thead>
<tr>
<th style="text-align:center">Value (left)</th>
<th style="text-align:center">Value (right)</th>
<th>Meaning</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>|o</code></td>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>o|</code></td>
<td>0或1</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>||</code></td>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>||</code></td>
<td>1</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>}o</code></td>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>o{</code></td>
<td>0或多个(无上限)</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>}|</code></td>
<td style="text-align:center"><code>|{</code></td>
<td>1或多个 (无上限)</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h4" id="e989b4e588ab_64"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e989b4e588ab_64" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e989b4e588ab_64" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="鉴别" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="鉴别" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">鉴别</span></h4>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">关系可以分为<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">identifying鉴别</strong>和<strong class="markdown_strong_asterisk">non-identifying非鉴别</strong>两种，它们分别用实线<code>--</code>和虚线<code>..</code>表示。区分它们的方法就是第二个实体是否可以独立存在。更简单的区分方法，就是类似数据库的多对多，如果在图上不想显示中间表，就使用虚线，想显示中间表，则使用实现。其他的一般都是实线。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Relationships may be classified as either <em class="markdown_em_asterisk">identifying</em> or <em class="markdown_em_asterisk">non-identifying</em> and these are rendered with either solid or dashed lines respectively. This is relevant when one of the entities in question can not have independent existence without the other.  For example a firm that insures people to drive cars might need to store data on <code>NAMED-DRIVER</code>s. In modelling this we might start out by observing that a <code>CAR</code> can be driven by many <code>PERSON</code> instances, and a <code>PERSON</code> can drive many <code>CAR</code>s - both entities can exist without the other, so this is a non-identifying relationship that we might specify in Mermaid as: <code>PERSON }|..|{ CAR : "driver"</code>.  Note the two dots in the middle of the relationship that will result in a dashed line being drawn between the two entities.  But when this many-to-many relationship is resolved into two one-to-many relationships, we observe that a <code>NAMED-DRIVER</code> cannot exist without both a <code>PERSON</code> and a <code>CAR</code> - the relationships become identifying and would be specified using hyphens, which translate to a solid line:</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>    CAR ||--o{ NAMED-DRIVER : allows<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="2"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">2</span>    PERSON ||--o{ NAMED-DRIVER : is<span style="user-select:none;display:none;"> </span><br class="code_line_break_hack_br"><hr class="code_line_break_hack_hr code_line_break_hack" style="margin:0;border:0;border-top:0;border-bottom:0;"></li></ol></div></div></div>
<h4 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h4" id="e5b19ee680a7_65"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e5b19ee680a7_65" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e5b19ee680a7_65" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="属性" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="属性" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">属性</span></h4>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 支持对实体的属性定义。在实体后面，用 <code>{}</code> 包裹具体的属性定义即可。</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" <span class="xsj_heading_content">用户行程图</span></h2>
<blockquote class="markdown_blockquote">
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>User journeys describe at a high level of detail exactly what steps different users take to complete a specific task within a system, application or website. This technique shows the current (as-is) user workflow, and reveals areas of improvement for the to-be workflow. (Wikipedia)</p>
</blockquote>

<span class="xsj_heading_content">饼图</span></h2>
<blockquote class="markdown_blockquote">
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>A pie chart (or a circle chart) is a circular statistical graphic, which is divided into slices to illustrate numerical proportion. In a pie chart, the arc length of each slice (and consequently its central angle and area), is proportional to the quantity it represents. While it is named for its resemblance to a pie which has been sliced, there are variations on the way it can be presented. The earliest known pie chart is generally credited to William Playfair's Statistical Breviary of 1801<br>
-Wikipedia</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">Mermaid 显示饼图示例.</p>

<h2 class="xsj_heading_hash xsj_heading xsj_heading_h2" id="e79498e789b9e59bbe_71"><div class="xiaoshujiang_element xsj_anchor">
  <a name="e79498e789b9e59bbe_71" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="e79498e789b9e59bbe_71" class="blank_anchor_id"></a><a name="甘特图" class="blank_anchor_name"></a><a id="甘特图" class="blank_anchor_id"></a>
</div>
<span class="xsj_heading_content">甘特图</span></h2>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0"><a href="https://mermaidjs.github.io/gantt.html" class="xsj_link xsj_auto_link">https://mermaidjs.github.io/gantt.html</a></p>
<blockquote class="markdown_blockquote">
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_1"><span class="xsj_placeholder_span"></span>A Gantt chart is a type of bar chart, first developed by Karol Adamiecki in 1896, and independently by Henry Gantt in the 1910s, that illustrates a project schedule. Gantt charts illustrate the start and finish dates of the terminal elements and summary elements of a project.</p>
</blockquote>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">甘特图是一类条形图，由Karol Adamiechi在1896年提出, 而在1910年Henry Gantt也独立的提出了此种图形表示。通常用在对项目终端元素和总结元素的开始及完成时间进行的描述。</p>
<p class="xsj_paragraph xsj_paragraph_level_0">语法</p>
<div class="xiaoshujiang_code_container"><div data-processed="true" class="xiaoshujiang_pre"><div class="nohighlight hljs code_linenums xiaoshujiang_code"><ol start="1" class="ol_linenums" style="counter-reset: lines 0;"><li class="li_linenum " date-linenum="1"><span class="li_linenum_before_span li_linenum_before_span_hide">1</span>gantt<span storyWriterMarkdown.title: 小书匠语法说明之mermaid
storyWriterMarkdown.excerpt:
通过 mermaid  可以实现以纯文本的方式绘制流程图，序列图，甘特图等。
小书匠编辑器在 markdown 强大的优势下，更是无缝集成了 mermaid 的所有功能，用户不需要任何配置，只要打开了语法开关，就可以使用所有 mermaid 图例功能。再加上小书匠的实时预览功能，...
